page.title: 20INVESTIGATING LONGSTANTON
page.content: In our investigations we found that most of the permanent residents were well pleased to live here. We were less sure that this was so with the Army families. But we felt that for almost everyone, the real interests were family and career, with the place coming a poor third. We are the 9 and 10 year-olds of Hatton Park School:{Kay Barnes, Rae {Brady, Bruce Chapman, Nicola Clarkson, {Tracy Fagg, Joanne Fletcher, Mark {Forwood, Adrian Garton, Michael Green, {Clare Gibbs, Melanie Gifford, Daniel {Harper, Catherine Hector, Cindy {Impett, Samantha Kirby, Simon Lange, {Peter Miles, Marisa Moore, Kellie {Rooke, Jonathan Savage, Paul Smith, {Paul Summersell, Adrian Taylor, Steven {Wilkinson and Alexandra Yorke, } slightly helped by their teacher.
